title: DynForms Module Options Schema
description: Creates a new DynForms NgModule to provide DynControls.

name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use for the DynModule?

path.description: The path at which to create the DynModule, relative to the workspace root.

controlPath.description: The relative path at which to create the default DynControl.
controlPath.x-prompt: Which relative path would you like to use for the default control?

controlName.description: The name of the default control.
controlName.x-prompt: What name would you like to use for the default control?

type.description: Adds a developer-defined type to the control filename, in the format "name.type.ts".

id.description: The ID of the default control.
id.x-prompt: Which ID would you like to identify the default control?

instance.description: The control instance type of the default control.

prefix.description: The prefix to apply to the generated control.

prefixInterface.description: The prefix to apply to the params interface.

prefixClass.description: Whether to prefix the control class name.

flat.description: Create the new files at the top level of the current project root.

lintFix.description: Apply lint fixes after generating the module.
